front.title: Extending the Number of IS-IS LSP Fragments Beyond the 256 Limit

abstract.t: This document describes a mechanism to allow a system to originatemore than 256 LSP fragments, a limit set by the original IntermediateSystem to Intermediate System (IS-IS) Routing protocol, as describedin ISO 10589. This mechanism can be used in IP-only, OSI-only, anddual routers.
